text: Confession: FTL really means FUCK THIS LOSS. I've lost more times than I care to remember. One thing that keeps me coming back is the amazing music. Watching your crew simultaneously suffocate and burn to death isn't so bad with a throbbing sick soundtrack to jam to.

author: Frog Man Cometh

text: That's the reality of thing. Depend on the case, a rebel isn't always the one that fight for the good of everyone.
author: Leon Fook

text: That's actually a point in it's favor, it's become so rare that the Enforcers of Law are the Underdogs, but that's what's going on in this game, and if you look into the Red Army (which was an uprising by the Bolsheviks that became a feared ruling power in Russia from 1917 until 1991, later adapting the Soviet Army name) it shows just how Dangerous that sort of thing can be. I highly recommend watching Dr Chivago (it's an older but incredibly well-aged film) as it delves with the whole, rebels can be just as dangerous as ruling authorities or royalties.

author: SupraDarky

text: the game is good. buy it.
author: OfficialAbass

text: Your best strategy is to take out missiles and shields. Then focus on other weapons and getting the engine and piloting systems down. It's not an easy game to beat by any means, but the reward for beating the game, the exhilaration you'll get, it's unmatched. If you ever want tips or anything, check out other people playing the game on youtube, it's definitely a challenge, but well worth it.
author: Ryan Randell

text: Yeah this battle takes some patience and good RNG. I've always found that investing in a cloaking device really pays off in this fight.
author: SolidusScott87

text: My best bet was to aim for a good boarding party. The three gunning rooms on the final boss are not connected to the rest of the ship and so once your boarding party takes out one, they can't repair those systems until the 2nd and 3rd phase of the battle. Then it's just rinse and repeat. It was how I got my only win in the game.
author: Chris Mudd

text: boarding party and leaving the left middle gun room alive so the AI doesn't take over and pray to God you dont get RNG screwed
author: Gouzaku Fuwachi

text: It's also possible to just brute force the thing, you'll need 4 burst lasers or equivalent on standard  and  adv. there are even more good options that work great with hacking but the strat of killing 3/4 gunners in phase one and leaving just that last gunner alive in phase two is the easiest one and most reliable because hacking and teleport are easy to get.
author: Øydin9
